text: Arthur Rossa "Pete" Giesen Jr. (August 8, 1932 â€“ April 2, 2021) was an American politician and businessman. He was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates from 1964 until 1996 as a Republican. He was the Minority leader of the state house from 1972 until 1974. Giesen was born in Radford, Virginia. Giesen died on April 2, 2021 in Richmond, Virginia at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Businesspeople from Virginia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
